name: Twin Mission - Sacred Way
description:
Two children elves are the chosen one in this time, Radshall is a pretty quiet and peacefull place in somewhere in Irland mountains and forest, but the evil is always coming back to destroy any energy of happiness!

Your mission: destroy all the possesed master bosses and bring the peace back to Radshall before the main Master infest Radshall and every place around...

#action #adventure #arcade #platformer #multiplayer #retro #altgame #other #mario #bomberman #contra #supercontra #dondokodon #pixel #pixelart #gamer #manga #japanese #demo #free

System Requirements

Disk Space: 150MB
RAM: 512
Graphic Card: 250MB
Support Keyboards and Mouse
Support Gamepads XBOX and Generics

Keyboard Controllers
Move: WSAD
Jump: Space
Shot: Mouse Left Click
Fairy Shield: Mouse Right Click

GamePad Controller (XBOX reference)
Move: D-Pad or Left Stick
Shot: X Jump: A
Fairy Shield: Right Bumper

This Demo is limited to 3 first Levels, No stories included
